# Summary

[Rent-controlled](../aggregators/rent-control.qmd) tenant-occupied dwellings trade at a discount [@Kholodilin2024]. The penalty has been estimated to be as low at 27%.

# Details

The discount reflects buyer expectations that:

- The property cannot be immediately occupied or renovated
- Evicting the sitting tenant may be legally difficult or impossible
- Rental income is constrained by existing tenancy agreements
- The property's full market value cannot be realized until the tenant vacates
